architecture.augmentations.equipment

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • architecture.augmentations.equipment.Equipment
      • architecture.augmentations.equipment.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item

    public class Weapon
extends Equipment
    A class to represent weapons. Weapons are split into two damage types (physical or magical) and 3 speed categories for 6 weapon types total. Weapon class handles generating various stats about the weapon (might, accuracy, boosts, etc.), some of which are specific to weapon equipment.

    • Field Detail

      • weaponTypes

        public static final java.lang.String[][] weaponTypes
        All types of weapons arranged in a two-dimensional array. The first index indicates damage type (physical or magical) and the second index indicates speed (slower weapons are stronger than faster counterparts).
